REASON: horribly tired the next day for several hours in the morning and into the afternoon.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR DIMETAPP: this did stop the coughing at night, i must fully admit.  i would never give this to a child, considering the potency of the sleep effect and residual effects from this drug.
Works better for me than any other allergy/cold medicine - no drowsiness or jitters. Clears my stuffy, runny nose and itchy eyes.
